div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2338 La Escuera, La Marina del Molar, near Alicante, before 1961 Burial: early 2nd cent. B.C. Contents: 52+ AE Hispano-Punic: 7 (as Robinson 20) 2 (as above but smaller) 43 (as R. 2q) Disposition: Alicante (Museo Arqueologico) Llobregat, Caesaraugusta 27-8 (1966), pp. 71-5, illus.
